title: How to download league of legends faster?
body:
Its my new hard disk and my net is not so fast that it will take so much time to download

Is there any torrent? which is closest to current patch?

thanks in advance!!

replies.body: [Downloading League of Legends](https://signup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/signup/redownload) from the official site is your best and safest bet.  I don't recommend downloading anywhere else as you can't guarantee its safety or if it contains the proper files.
It isn't recommended to download League from a 3rd party. I suggest downloading League from the official site and doing something while it downloads.
